message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $15,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to offer $10,000 for it.
Thanks for your interest, Bob.  While $15,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $13,000.  I think that's a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to offer $11,000 for the product.
